amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in H.R. 1 to be used to pay the salary of any officer or employee of any Federal department or agency with respect to carrying out the provisions of Public Law 111-148 (Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act), Public Law 111-152 (Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010), or any amendment made by either Public Law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 268 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in H.R. 1 to be used to pay the salary of any officer or employee of any Federal department or agency with respect to carrying out the provisions of Public Law 111-148 (Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act), Public Law 111-152 (Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010), or any amendment made by such either Public Law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A095) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 191 (Roll no. 99).
